title: STAT+: Argenx CEO to step down in May, be succeeded by COO
description: Argenx CEO Tim Van Hauwermeiren is stepping down in May and will be succeeded by Karen Massey, the Belgian drugmaker's COO.
content: Argenx CEO Tim Van Hauwermeiren is stepping down in May and will be succeeded by Karen Massey, the Belgian drugmaker's COO.
